txt.en: Mother Amma is in Bazanmanar, in north-east Clovengap.\n\nYou should tell Mother Amma that you freed the Angmarim deserters.

Mother Amma's face is dark as she reads from the journal.

'\qThe traitorous prisoners, the ones who tried to get away. Like she tried to get away. They are being tested now! Tested for the master in the muck. Muck muck....\q'

Mother Amma shakes herself, and closes the book with a snap.

'They are using the crystals and sorceries on their own people, [placeholder]. We must stop them before they are successful! Free who you can, if possible. They are the enemy, but no one deserves that fate.'
Having run out of test subjects within Clovengap, the maddened Angmarim have turned on their own.
'Good work, friend. May they find a way to be of use to their people as the Men rebuild.'
Missing scouts can be found in Gadh Ujáf, Zagâf Muzug, and Rung-shakam.\n\nYou should look for, and rescue, the missing scouts.
